attributes.additional_details: Also carrier bags at supermarkets why pay £10p for an plastic carrier bag yes i know it's easy if you forgot to bring a bag but stop using the plastic ones and use the renewable ones and just keep taking it to the shop and stop using the plastic ones as they are getitng swept into the sea because of people
attributes.background: So plastic bottles have been a big thing nowadays as you see them everywhere. Maybe stop using plastic bottles and bags as animals are dieing from eating and chewing them as been left in the sea because of the members of public dropping it
